summary: Dr. Govini is an accomplished Cardiothoracic and Heart & Lung Transplant surgeon and specializes in caring for the patient with all aetiologies of heart failure, chronic asthma, a chronic lung disease that needs surgical management.Dr. Govini’s has trained underworld class transplant surgeons in Hong Kong, Austria, Germany and South Korea. Dr. Govini is one of the pioneer surgeons in establishing Lung Transplant, Heart & Lung Transplant program in India performing transplant surgeries in patients ranging from 17 years to 74  years. He specializes in LiveLung Transplant i.e. incorporating different lobes from two different donors – typically performed on pediatric patients. Dr. Govini is also proficient in VATS (Video-assisted Thoracic Surgery) and MICS (Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery) for various heart & lung diseases amongst others. Although Dr. Govini is fluent in his mother tongue Telugu, he is also proficient in Tamil, Kannada, Hindi and of course English.  Highlights:   - Over 7000 open and closed heart surgeries in adults and children  - 350 Heart & Lung Transplants  - Leading Live Lung Transplant Surgeon in India  - Beating Heart Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (OP-CABG)  - Laser Lung Surgery

summary: After finishing medical graduation in India, Dr. Refai moved to the UK for further training. His career in Cardiology was undertaken at World Class Tertiary Cardiac Centres like St.Bartholomew's Hospital (London), Imperial College Hospital (formerly called as Hammersmith Hospital, London), St George's Hospital (London), The Essex Cardiothoracic Surgeon Centre (Essex) and King's College Hospital (London). He moved back to India after 14 years of specialist training in advanced Interventional Cardiology and practising in India for last 4 yrs. He is currently practising in Apollo Main Hospital, Greams Road, Chennai.   He is currently holding the prestigious Fellowship of Royal College of Physicians, London (FRCP, London) and Fellowship of American College of Cardiology (FACC) and Fellowship of European Society of Cardiology (FESC). He also holds an academic title of "Professor" at Apollo Hospital Educational and Research Foundation.  Specialist in Angioplasty (Stent placement), Transradial Rotablation, Chronic Total Occlusion (CTO) Angioplasty, Left main stem (LMCA), Bifurcation angioplasty, Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT), Transcatheter valvular interventions, Pacemaker, ICD, CRT implantation and ASD closures .   TAVI (Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation)  Fellowship undertaken at King's College Hospital, London which is one of the high volume TAVI centers in the world performing TAVI's from 2007.  He has published extensively in the field of Cardiology with more than 50 peer-reviewed publications in reputed International Journals. summary: Dr. Damodaran is a renowned Interventional Cardiologist in Chennai and across the country. With his DM in Cardiology from Madras Medical College and Research Institute (Dr. MGR Medical University) and over 13 years of a highly proficient experience in Interventional Cardiologist, he brings with him, an unparalleled expertise and caliber in interventional cardiac procedures. His expertise in Interventional Cardiologist is reflected in his Postdoctoral Fellowship in National Board (FNB) from Escorts Heart Institute, Delhi. He is also a Fellow of European Society of Cardiology (FESC) and the Fellow of Society of Coronary Angiography and Intervention (FSCAI) (USA).  Dr. Dhamodaran is currently working as the senior consultant Interventional Cardiologist in Apollo Hospitals, Greams Road- a Multi super-specialty hospital in the center of Chennai. He also practices in Sidharam Multispeciality Clinic in Adyar in the evening. He believes in the philosophy of group-practice and teamwork, and heads a team of 5 cardiologists and a surgeon, and oversees the work of the entire team. Currently, he and his group, perform about 1500 diagnostic procedures and  500 interventional procedures in a year. The quality of the resonating teamwork is evident in the smile and satisfaction of the patients.  His prowess as an efficient department head was seen when he established the Cardiology and Interventional Cardiology Department in Billroth Hospitals, Shenoy Nagar in 2006, and oversaw the team, the department, and the hospital grows into a high-volume tertiary care cardiac-center over 7 years. Prior to this remarkable stint, he has worked in MIOT Hospitals, Lifeline Hospital OMR, Frontier Lifeline (Dr. KM Cherian Hospital) and also in Apollo Samudra Hospital in Kakinada.  He has authored and co-authored credible publications, both in the National and International arena. He has award-winning presentations in national level conferences. His research endeavors are reflected in him being a Ph.D. Guide in the Periyar Maniammai University of Tanjore. He also continuously trains young cardiologists in the field of Interventional Cardiologist by conducting series of CMEs and workshops in association with international experts. He was instrumental in the formation of Tamil Nadu Interventional Cardiology Council( TIC ), a forum for Cardiology Interventional community across the state in the year 2013 and served as joint secretary for two consecutive years and successfully conducted TIC Conferences in 2013 and 2014. In the interest of the general physicians, he established PCR Cardiometabolic forum in 2007 - an academic forum which conducts regular CMEs and other academic activities since its inception.  To increase public awareness about cardiovascular health, he has been running a Preventive Cardiology Clinic which has diagnostic and rehabilitation programs, from which interventional cases are translated to hospital settings. As a part of community outreach, he has conducted and has been an active part of many health-check camps and awareness campaigns in various districts across the state spanning over the past 10 years. Dr. Damodaran believes in a two-pronged approach that encompasses both expertise and empathy.

summary: Dr. Madhu Prabhudoss is a highly esteemed cardiologist with over two decades of experience, serving patients at Apollo Specialty Hospitals OMR in Chennai. His commitment to providing personalized care ensures that each patient receives the attention and treatment necessary for their specific condition. With his wealth of experience and unwavering dedication to patient well-being, Dr. Madhu Prabhudoss stands as a respected figure in the field of cardiology, making him a trusted healthcare provider for individuals seeking cardiac care in Chennai and beyond.

summary: Dr Srinivasan K N is a distinguished Cardiologist in Chennai with over 11 years of experience and holds an MD and DNB in Cardiology. He is also a member of the Indian Medical Association, Medical Council Of India, Cardiology Society Of India and, National Interventional Council Tamil Nadu. Dr Srinivasan K N is known for treating conditions like cardiac arrhythmias (irregular heartbeats), dilated cardiomyopathy (a disease of the heart muscle), orthostatic hypotension (sudden drop in blood pressure), and patent foramen ovale (a hole in the heart that didn't close after birth). His expertise extends to performing complex procedures such as cardiac catheterisation (a test to detect clogged arteries), angioplasty (a procedure to open blocked arteries), and stent implantation (to keep arteries open). Practising at Apollo Hospitals Greams Road, Thousand Lights, West Tamil Nadu, Chennai, Dr Srinivasan K N provides accessible and expert cardiology services. His consultation fees start from Rs. 1000. summary: Dr. K. Jaishankar is Director and Mentor, Cardiology and Electrophysiology at MIOT International Hospitals, Manapakkam, Chennai, and has an experience of 27 years in his chosen field. Dr. Jaishankar completed MBBS from Stanley Medical College & Hospital, Chennai in 1991; MD from MGM Medical College in 1996; and DM - Cardiology from MAMC GB Pant Hospital, New Delhi in 2001. He is a Life Member of Cardiology Society, Indian Medical Association and Indian Heart Rhythm Society; and Fellow of the European Society of Cardiology and Indian Academy of Medical Specialties. Some of the services provided by Dr. Jaishankar are Implantable Cardioverter - Defibrillators (ICDs), Coronary Angiogram and Pacemaker Implantation.

Dr Arun Kalyanasundaram MD has been appointed as APCTO Director in India ,  as a recognized leader in the field of Cardiology, specifically Chronic Total Occlusion Interventions (100% heart blockage) in the US and globally. He trained at leading institutions in the USA including Cleveland Clinic (ranked #1 in cardiology for the last 23 years).   Most recently, he served as the head of the CTO PCI program at Swedish Medical center, Seattle, USA, and is the former chief of cardiology at Highline Medical Center, Seattle, USA. He is a consultant to several companies in the field of CTOs and is one of the most widely sought out proctors for teaching this procedure within the US and internationally, and is extensively published in this field. Besides holding an academic appointment at the University of Washington, Seattle, he has been a full time proctor for CTOs in the Asia-Pacific region and has helped disseminate the “Hybrid CTO” approach.   Presently, he sees patients in India in 2 locations.   New Delhi: Fortis Escorts Heart Institute where he is Director, Interventional Cardiology  and Head, CTO PCI program.   Chennai: Promed Multi Speciality & Diagnostic Centre  Areas of Expertise: Complex coronary angioplasty, calcified vessels, bifurcations, 100% blockages, Atherectomy, laser angioplasty, rotational Atherectomy.

summary: Dr. R Sivakumar is a Interventional Cardiologist in Mandavelli,Chennai and has an experience of 14 years in this field. Dr. R Sivakumar practices at OM Family Clinic, Mandavelli and Madras Medical Mission Hospital - Institute of Cardio Vascular Diseases, Chennai. He is a member of Cardiaology Society of India .

college: The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University (TNMGRMU)
summary: Dr. Kirubakaran is a Cardiologist in T Nagar, Chennai and has an experience of 6 years in this field. Dr. Kirubakaran practices at Apollo Medical Center in T Nagar, Chennai. He completed MBBS from The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University (TNMGRMU) in 2002,MD - General Medicine from Barkatulla University, Bhopal in 2007 and DNB - Cardiology from National Board Of Examination in 2011. He is a member of Tamilnadu Medical Council.

college: The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University (TNMGRMU)
summary: Dr.V. Rajesh completed his M.S. General Surgery from JIPMER, Pondicherry. Subsequently he underwent training in Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery from GB Pant Hospital attached to Maulana Azad Medical College, New Delhi which he completed in 2006. Worked in high volume centres both in India and Overseas and has been involved in more than 8000 cardiac surgeries.   After his training in Cardiac surgery, Dr Rajesh worked as Junior Consultant at the Frontier Lifeline hospital with world renowned surgeon Dr. K. M. Cherian. Worked as Overseas fellow in both adult and paediatric cardiac surgery at the Westmead Children’s hospital and adult hospital. Aftera tenure of 2Years as Consultant Cardiothoracic Surgeon at Sri Ramachandra Medical centre, Chennai,joined Bharathirajaa Speciality Hospital as Chief Consultant Cardiothoracic Surgeon. He has extensive experience in the full spectrum of Cardiothoracic surgery including Beating heart Coronary bypass, valve replacements and repairs, congenital heart surgery, aortic surgery and thoracic procedures with a credential of 100% Success.He has published several papers  both national and international journals presented papers in various national conferences.
Consultant Interventional Cardiologist
Consultant Interventional Cardiologist currently practicing at Medway Heart Institute, Kodambakkam, Chennai.

college: The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University (TNMGRMU)
summary: Dr. Sanjai is an outstanding Cardiologist having about 10 years of clinical practice. He has a stellar academic career and garnered many award and accolades for his excellent performance in the area of medicine, as well as extra-academic activities. Dr. Sanjai specializes in Cardioac-electrophysiology. He has performed about thousand EP studies during his practice span. He is skilled in Cardiac interventions such as Coronary angiogram and angioplasty, Peripheral angiolasty, ASD , VSD, PDA device closures and Pacemaker implant.

Dr Pramod has been with Apollo Hospitals since 1995. He started out as an associate consultant, spent two years in Al Khaleej Apollo Clinic in Dubai as a consultant cardiologist, and was back in Apollo Hospital in Chennai as an interventional cardiologist. His key areas of interest are interventional cardiology echocardiography and heart failure management. He has completed more than 7500 interventional cardiac procedures and 1500 transoesophageal echocardiography procedures. In addition to his hectic schedule as a practising medical professional, he has been teaching postgraduate and DNB trainees for over 22 years. Dr Pramod completed his medical studies in Kerala after which he joined UCLA in Los Angeles where he completed his training in CT coronary angio procedures.

college.1: R G Kar Medical College and Hospital
summary: Consultant Interventional Cardiologist practising chennai with Apollo hospitals. Key areas of specialisation include simple and complex angioplasty, chronic total occlusions, three vessel blockages eliminating need for bypass surgery, pacemakers and ICD therapy for heart failure, device closure of congenital defects in heart by needle prick end-vascular route, aortic and peripheral vessel angioplasty for claudication and  non healing ulcers and endo-vascular aneurysm repairs.
